charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 24 months of imprisonment. Supervised release: 4 years with the special conditions that defendant participate in a drug treatment program as directed by the probation department and that he not possess any kind of firearms. The Court recommends that defendant be placed in a facility that is located in the tri-state area. Special Assessment: $200.00. (1s)
